job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Our cloud solutions are enablers of the digital transformation for business and our normal life. One of the enabling technologies for the digital transformation is cloud computing, this will enable a completely other way of working for the business.

   To support this, NXP-IT formed a Cloud Center of Excellence (Cloud CoE) reporting directly into the CIO. The Cloud CoE's goal is to enable accelerated and sustainable adoption of cloud across the enterprise (both business and IT) - maximizing the ability to realize its benefits while reducing risk. This team is recognized as the industry leading Cloud Center of Excellence for the high-tech industry.

   The Cloud CoE is responsible for defining Strategy and policy for cloud computing, driving, and implementing cloud services and platforms, running proof of concepts, piloting emerging cloud technologies (e.g. GenAI, Machine Learning) and supporting business-initiatives in adapting cloud technologies (including organizational change).

   As a Cloud engineer you are challenged to build and operate a cloud platforms and cloud products in line with vision and stakeholder expectation. You possess a good balance between technical proficiency, business understanding with communication skills. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of cloud computing and technology systems. You should have a positive attitude and communication skills to effectively share your knowledge.

   Your Responsibilities

     * Design, implement and maintain a fully automated cloud platform and cloud products, adhering to the compliancy and security guardrails.
     * Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines, re-usable cloud data products, and underlying enabling tooling for Cloud based IT services, including documentation.
     * Developing and maintaining ( incl lifecycle management) re-usable cloud products.
     * Work in DevOps / Scrum settings and apply techniques of continuous verification & delivery to ensure the quality of our products and services. You built it , you run it
     * Respond to technical issues in a professional and timely manner
     * Be evangelist of Cloud computing to the rest of NXP
     * Stay up to speed with the newest Cloud technologies (AWS, Azure)
     * Pro-actively collaborate with other IT teams and business teams
     * Actively participate in communities / forums / guilds on cloud computing and data solutions (e.g. data engineering, analytics, machine learning) (both external and internal to NXP)

   Our team
     * The Cloud CoE is a team of dedicated and passionate IT professionals. The team is around 30 people which are in Eindhoven the Netherlands and in Bangalore, India
     * The Cloud CoE consists for Cloud platform team including enabling role and Cloud Data platform team including enabling role.
job_details.full_text:
Cloud Engineer

Our cloud solutions are enablers of the digital transformation for business and our normal life. One of the enabling technologies for the digital transformation is cloud computing, this will enable a completely other way of working for the business.

   To support this, NXP-IT formed a Cloud Center of Excellence (Cloud CoE) reporting directly into the CIO. The Cloud CoE's goal is to enable accelerated and sustainable adoption of cloud across the enterprise (both business and IT) - maximizing the ability to realize its benefits while reducing risk. This team is recognized as the industry leading Cloud Center of Excellence for the high-tech industry.

   The Cloud CoE is responsible for defining Strategy and policy for cloud computing, driving, and implementing cloud services and platforms, running proof of concepts, piloting emerging cloud technologies (e.g. GenAI, Machine Learning) and supporting business-initiatives in adapting cloud technologies (including organizational change).

   As a Cloud engineer you are challenged to build and operate a cloud platforms and cloud products in line with vision and stakeholder expectation. You possess a good balance between technical proficiency, business understanding with communication skills. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of cloud computing and technology systems. You should have a positive attitude and communication skills to effectively share your knowledge.

   Your Responsibilities

     * Design, implement and maintain a fully automated cloud platform and cloud products, adhering to the compliancy and security guardrails.
     * Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines, re-usable cloud data products, and underlying enabling tooling for Cloud based IT services, including documentation.
     * Developing and maintaining ( incl lifecycle management) re-usable cloud products.
     * Work in DevOps / Scrum settings and apply techniques of continuous verification & delivery to ensure the quality of our products and services. You built it , you run it
     * Respond to technical issues in a professional and timely manner
     * Be evangelist of Cloud computing to the rest of NXP
     * Stay up to speed with the newest Cloud technologies (AWS, Azure)
     * Pro-actively collaborate with other IT teams and business teams
     * Actively participate in communities / forums / guilds on cloud computing and data solutions (e.g. data engineering, analytics, machine learning) (both external and internal to NXP)

   Our team
     * The Cloud CoE is a team of dedicated and passionate IT professionals. The team is around 30 people which are in Eindhoven the Netherlands and in Bangalore, India
     * The Cloud CoE consists for Cloud platform team including enabling role and Cloud Data platform team including enabling role.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on cloud computing, platform engineering, and MLOps/data engineering enablement, but does not involve the core development or fine-tuning of AI models themselves. While it mentions piloting emerging technologies like GenAI and Machine Learning, the primary responsibilities are centered around building and operating cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines, rather than being a specialist in AI model development or application. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's a technical role but not directly an AI specialist role as defined by the other profiles.

job_tasks.justification: The job description mentions 'enablers of the digital transformation for business', 'align technical solutions with strategic goals', and 'supporting business-initiatives in adapting cloud technologies', indicating a need to understand business context and align IT solutions with business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: enablers of the digital transformation for business

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding stakeholder expectations and aligning cloud platform development with them.

The role involves designing, implementing, and maintaining 're-usable cloud data products' and participating in communities related to 'data engineering, analytics, machine learning', indicating involvement in data infrastructure and products.
The job description mentions active participation in communities focused on data solutions, including data engineering.
The job description mentions piloting 'Machine Learning' as an emerging technology, indicating exposure to modeling concepts, though not necessarily direct development.
The role involves designing, implementing, and maintaining cloud platforms and products, which includes building and managing the underlying software and services.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, implement and maintain a fully automated cloud platform and cloud products

job_tasks.justification: The core responsibility includes designing, implementing, and maintaining CI/CD pipelines and underlying enabling tooling for cloud-based IT services.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines, re-usable cloud data products, and underlying enabling tooling

job_tasks.justification: The role involves developing and maintaining reusable cloud products, including lifecycle management, which is a software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: Developing and maintaining ( incl lifecycle management) re-usable cloud products

job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly states 'Work in DevOps / Scrum settings and apply techniques of continuous verification & delivery' and 'You built it , you run it', which are core principles of MLOps and operations engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Work in DevOps / Scrum settings and apply techniques of continuous verification & delivery

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'You built it , you run it' directly implies ownership and responsibility for the operational aspects of the developed products and services.
job_tasks.phrase: You built it , you run it

job_tasks.justification: Responding to technical issues in a timely manner is a key aspect of operational support and maintenance.
job_tasks.phrase: Respond to technical issues in a professional and timely manner

job_tasks.justification: Staying up-to-date with the newest cloud technologies is crucial for maintaining and evolving cloud platforms and services.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay up to speed with the newest Cloud technologies

soft_skills.phrase: communication skills to effectively share your knowledge
Pro-actively collaborate with other IT teams and business teams
Stay up to speed with the newest Cloud technologies
Respond to technical issues in a professional and timely manner
You built it , you run it
